hero.title: Hi, I'm Mame Yacine NDIAYE
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
points: Full-Stack Development: Building robust web and mobile applications.
Artificial Intelligence: Developing solutions based on Machine Learning and Computer Vision.
Architecture & Performance: Creating scalable, secure, and optimized applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Full-Stack Developer specializing in designing high-performance web and mobile applications, I combine technical expertise with strategic vision to create robust and scalable digital solutions. My academic background in **Master’s at Ynov Campus** allows me to deepen my skills in **Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science**, with a focus on solving real-world problems.

I am proficient in **JavaScript (React, Node.js, Express)**, secure backend architectures, as well as development in **Python, Java, and PHP**. I place particular emphasis on writing clean code, following best practices in software architecture, and optimizing performance.

Passionate about innovation, I am especially interested in applications integrating **AI and computer vision**, aiming to build intelligent solutions with high added value. Rigorous, autonomous, and collaborative, I fully invest myself in projects to provide a sustainable and structured technical contribution.

items.position: Data Scientist Intern - Web Scraping & CRM
items.description: Developed automated web scraping scripts for marketing campaigns and built a CRM system to manage leads and communication workflows.
highlights: Automated web scraping scripts to support marketing campaigns
Designed and implemented a CRM to manage leads and workflows
Built data pipelines for efficient processing and storage
Performed exploratory data analysis and data visualization

items.description: Developed backend Python applications for internal tools and automation projects.
highlights: Developed Python applications for internal tools and process automation
Designed and implemented REST APIs to integrate internal systems
Automated data collection, validation, and reporting tasks
Collaborated with senior developers following Agile methodologies
Advanced Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques
Algorithmic visualization and model interpretability
Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing
Deployment and optimization of AI models
Hands-on AI projects and practical applications
Full-Stack application development with React, PHP Symfony, SQL/NoSQL
Built e-commerce platforms, chatbots, and dashboards
Developed games in Java and Python
REST API development, cloud deployment with Azure, Docker and AWS
Data visualization using Qlik Sense and Power BI
UX/UI design and responsive web design

items.degree: Bachelor in Computer Sciences - Core Curriculum
highlights: Programming, software development, networking, and project management
Created websites, games, and RESTful APIs
Integrated front-end and back-end systems
Worked on Agile projects, debugging, testing, and documentation

High academic achievements

items.title: AlgoTrade Lab – Trading Analysis and Simulation Platform
items.description: Complete web application for simulating and analyzing trading strategies. The platform allows users to test algorithms on historical data, visualize performance in real-time and analyze financial indicators through dynamic charts.
highlights: Complete algorithmic trading simulation platform with user management
Modular backend architecture (controllers, services, routes, models) with Express.js
Secure authentication with JWT and user role management
Strategy backtesting: test algorithms on historical data with automatic performance calculation
Financial indicator calculation: RSI, Moving Averages (SMA/EMA), MACD
Advanced data visualization: interactive dynamic charts with Chart.js
Personalized user dashboard: performance tracking, statistics, simulation history
Virtual portfolio management: initial capital, profits/losses, drawdown, returns
Secure and documented REST API for Frontend/Backend communication
MongoDB database optimized for storing users, strategies, histories and results
Modern and responsive interface with Angular and TypeScript
Containerization with Docker for simplified deployment
Structured and scalable code, ready for evolution towards microservices or AI integration

items.title: Admins–Students Platform
items.description: Modern multi-role web platform (Admin / Student) for complete educational management: courses, lessons, quizzes, discussion forum. Responsive interface with persistent dark/light theme, real-time search and automatic quiz correction with grading.
highlights: Complete educational platform: course, lesson, quiz, and forum management
Advanced multi-role system: administration, user management and role-based access control (RBAC)
Robust MVC architecture with Symfony 7.0: relational database with 11 tables
Intelligent quizzes: multiple choice questions, automatic correction, real-time scoring, attempt history
Modern and responsive interface: Bootstrap 5.3.0, Font Awesome 6.4.0, mobile/desktop adapted design
Persistent theme dark/light: automatic management with cookies (1 year), visual consistency everywhere
Real-time search: dynamic filtering of courses, users, quizzes and lessons without page reload
Integrated forum: post creation, student exchange, conversation management
Student dashboard: personalized dashboard, course tracking, quiz results, learning statistics
Complete admin panel: full CRUD for all elements (courses, users, quizzes, questions)
Secure authentication: login/registration system, session management, data validation
Optimized UX: smooth transitions, animations, hover effects, confirmation messages, validations

items.title: Intervention Management System
items.description: Modern web system for complete technical intervention management with multi-role support (Admin / Dispatcher / Technician / Client). Professional responsive interface with secure authentication, personalized dashboards and complete CRUD for interventions and users.
highlights: Advanced multi-role system: 4 distinct roles (Admin, Dispatcher, Technician, Client) with role-based access control (RBAC)
Custom MVC architecture: simple but robust router, clear separation of concerns
Relational database: 6 tables with complex relationships between User, Client, Technician, Dispatcher, Admin, Intervention
Personalized dashboards: each role has an adapted dashboard to their needs and permissions
Complete CRUD: full management of interventions and users with data validation
Modern and responsive interface: professional design with gradients, smooth animations, hover effects
Consistent theme: violet-blue gradients, color badges for statuses, styled tables
Secure authentication: login/registration system with PHP sessions, password hashing
Status management: interventions with statuses (Pending, In Progress, Completed) and urgency levels
Notification system: flash messages for actions (success, error)
Smart navigation: automatic redirection to appropriate dashboard based on role
Dynamic forms: intervention creation/modification with optional and required fields

items.title: Africa Shop - African E-commerce Platform
items.description: Modern and high-performance e-commerce platform dedicated to African products with complete admin system. Integrates React/Vite responsive frontend, Node.js/Express backend with JWT authentication, payment management (Stripe/PayPal), and advanced admin dashboard for product, order and category management.
highlights: Complete e-commerce platform: catalog of 26 products, 6 categories, persistent cart and secure checkout
Multi-level authentication: JWT system for customers and administrators with distinct roles (admin/client)
Integrated payment management: Stripe and PayPal support with success/cancellation pages and confirmation
Advanced admin dashboard: complete CRUD management of products, orders, categories with interactive modals
Dynamic KPI system: 5 statistical cards (orders, revenue, pending, paid, products)
Smart filtering: sorting by status/date, products by categories from database
Image management: base64 encoding for upload/modification directly from forms
Responsive interface: adaptive grid, hero banner with gradient, consistent client/admin design
Dynamic footer: categories automatically fetched from database
Smart navigation: sticky navbar, cart link, admin link visible only for connected admins
Interactive modals: dialogs for product creation, modification, deletion with confirmation
Complete validation: forms with required fields, error messages, success notifications
Professional design: primary green color #059669, yellow gradient #fbbf24, smooth animations

items.title: FESSEF - Student Community Platform
items.description: Modern and complete web platform for the Federation of Senegalese Student Associations in France. Integrates React/Vite responsive frontend, Node.js/Express backend with JWT authentication, complete event management, associations, institutions, job offers, and advanced admin dashboard for all content management.
highlights: Complete community platform with multi-entity management: events, associations, institutions, job offers, former presidents and boards
Multi-level authentication: JWT system for members and administrators with distinct roles
Event management: creation, modification, deletion of events with images, dates, complete descriptions
Association management: complete catalog of affiliated associations with detailed information
Institution management: partnerships and associated institutions with contact details
Employment portal: job offers targeted for Senegalese students in France
Gallery of former presidents: history with photos and biographies
Administrator dashboard: complete interface for managing all contents
File upload: image management with Multer for events and contents
Interactive cartography: Leaflet integration for event location display
Notification system: EmailJS for automatic communication
Contact forms: EmailJS integration for direct communication
Responsive interface: consistent design on all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Smart navigation: admin sidebar, sticky header, dynamic footer
MySQL database: complex relationships between entities

items.title: AgroTech - Smart Agricultural Mobile App
items.description: Complete native multiplatform mobile application (iOS/Android) for intelligent agriculture. Integrates React Native 19.0.0 with IA diagnosis screens via Google Cloud Dialogflow, real-time climate management, biometric authentication (Face ID/Biometrics), AI-powered chatbot, image management with Expo Image Picker, advanced navigation with React Navigation, and Express.js backend for REST API.
highlights: Native mobile application iOS and Android with React Native
Plant disease diagnosis via Google Cloud Dialogflow AI
Interactive chat with AI chatbot for agricultural advice
Secure authentication: Face ID, fingerprints and Keychain
Real-time climate management with charts and forecasts
Integrated geolocation with @react-native-community/geolocation
Image selection and processing (Expo Image Picker)
Multi-screen navigation with React Navigation Stack
Smooth animations with React Native Reanimated and Animatable
Secure local storage with AsyncStorage and React Native Keychain
Push notifications with Notifee
Responsive UI adapted to mobile design
Intuitive onboarding screens
Home dashboard with agricultural statistics
Modular and scalable architecture
Testing with Jest

items.title: Meeting Management Chatbot
items.description: Python/Flask chatbot with advanced NLP to manage meetings. The assistant understands natural language requests, extracts details (dates, times, participants) and automatically creates events in Google Calendar with conflict detection.
highlights: Intelligent chatbot completely functional with NLP
6 intents detected with 95%+ accuracy
Automatic entity extraction
Complete Google Calendar integration
Real-time conflict detection
Modern and reactive web interface
REST API with 14+ endpoints
19/19 passing tests
Modular and scalable architecture
Complete documentation
Production-ready code
Optimal performance (200ms latency)

items.title: Strategic Card Combat Game
items.description: Strategic card combat game application developed in Java with Swing graphical interface. The player faces the computer by invoking monsters, using special abilities and managing tactical strategy. The game integrates a complete card system with 15 unique monsters, a turn-by-turn combat system, opponent AI and complete board game management.
highlights: Complete desktop application with Swing graphical interface
Card and deck system with 15 unique monsters
Turn-by-turn combat engine with tactical mechanics
Opponent AI with intelligent game logic
Special ability system per champion
Three types of monsters: Normal, Warriors, Healers
Card image and interface management
Game board with monster invocation
Life points and attack system
Modular and extensible architecture
Factory Pattern for entity creation
Complete logging system
Responsive and intuitive UI
User event management
Well-structured and documented code
JUnit integrated tests

items.title: Image Segmentation with Clustering and 3D Visualization
items.description: Complete desktop application for image segmentation with clustering and interactive 3D visualization developed in Python with Tkinter interface. The project implements 4 clustering algorithms (K-Means, GMM, MeanShift, Spectral) with PCA preprocessing, interactive 3D visualization and advanced color palette management.
highlights: Complete GUI application with modern Tkinter interface
4 advanced clustering algorithms integrated
PCA preprocessing for dimensional reduction
Interactive 3D visualization of clusters
Intelligent color palette management
Background processing without UI blocking
High resolution PNG export of results
Multiple image format support
Comparative model analysis
Complete logging system
Modular and extensible architecture
Optimized image management with Pillow
Intuitive and responsive interface
Customizable configuration per model
Matplotlib palette support
Robust validation and error handling

items.title: Fashion-MNIST Classification Suite
items.description: Complete Fashion-MNIST image classification project developed in Python with OOP architecture. Implementation of 7 machine learning models (SVM, MLP, XGBoost, Random Forest, ExtraTrees, Logistic Regression, Naive Bayes) with multi-modal feature engineering (Raw pixels, HOG, LBP, Edge detection, statistics) and advanced optimization via Grid Search and Cross-Validation.
highlights: 7 advanced classification models integrated
Multi-modal feature engineering (5 types of features)
Hyperparameter optimization with Grid Search
Cross-validation and robust statistical analysis
Detailed confusion matrices and error analysis
Learning curves and variance analysis
Modular and reusable pipeline
Advanced comparative visualizations
Complete and structured logging system
Well-organized OOP architecture
CLI support with multiple modes
High-quality results export
Automated and reproducible benchmarking
Comparative model analysis
Optimal memory management
Performance > 92% on Fashion-MNIST

items.title: HexMaster - Intelligent Agent for Hex Game
items.description: Sophisticated intelligent agent developed in Python for the Hex board game as part of the INF8175 project. The agent uses the Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning, sophisticated heuristics, and intelligent time management to make optimal decisions. Capable of defeating experienced human players and reference agents with a 100% win rate.
highlights: Ultra-high-performance AI agent defeating experienced human players
Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning up to 15 plys
100% win rate against reference agents (random & greedy)
Smart time management with adaptive allocation per phase
Dijkstra pathfinding with differentiated costs by piece type
Multi-factor heuristics (shortest path, connectivity, edge control, strategic positions)
Proactive threat detection and blocking
Differential strategy to maximize positive advantage
Multi-ply analysis for critical moves
Crash detection system with automatic retry
Modular architecture with stratified decision pipeline
Optimal performance: responses in 0.1s average
Automated tests with graceful error handling
Interactive GUI interface for human vs agent play
Well-structured and documented code
